roleset.name: heave upwards; turbulence, turmoil, agitation
roleset.note: UPHEAVAL-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Slight comparison to heave.03 and convulse.01. Framed by Katie. (from upheaval.01-n)

example.name: upheave-v
example.text: what could be this sin that-1 *-1 so upheaved her soul?

example.name: upheaval-n
example.text: The vast upheaval of the World War set in motion forces that will either destroy civilization or raise mankind to undreamed of heights of human welfare
